pages.text: Adrenaline does not have to be the only thing racing through your veins in a state of emergency.$(br2)With every heart lost, the $(l:resources/stratine)Stratine Gem$() in this ring shines brighter and brighter, pulsating in the same rhythm as your racing heart - granting you an exponential damage boost.
